ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: I have a question about eqgame.exe
ygData.msgSnippet: run the patcher, advanced- complete file check If that doesn t find something, search for dxdiag on your system and make sure all your DirectX stuff is
ygData.messageBody:
run the patcher, advanced->complete file check If that doesn't find
something, search for dxdiag on your system and make sure all your DirectX
stuff is functioning propperly.

>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "lady_of_onlinegames"
> <lady_1980_93446@y...> wrote:
> > I get to the servers and then it starts to go but then a box comes
> up
> > and says eqgame.exe encountered a problem and needs to close.
> > Anyone else having this problem and do you know what to do about
> it?
> > can someone assist me please?
> >
> > Thanks
